item.title: Western Digital introduces a microSD card with a storage capacity of 400GB
item.description:
This is the 400GB SanDisk Ultra microSD card. Western Digital Corporation has introduced a 400GB SanDisk Ultra microSDXC UHS-I card, boasting the largest capacity available for mobile devices. This UHS Speed class 1 card enables smooth recording of full HD videos. Smartphones that are compatible need to support the SDXC standard. Margaret Koh, Sales Director, Asia South at Western Digital Corporation, emphasizes, “We provide storage solutions for everyone with digital content...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/western-digital-introduces-a-microsd-card-with-a-storage-capacity-of-400gb/
